title: IoT (Internet of Things) Foundations and Applied Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming and network concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical IoT technology training for general citizens. Simulations and VR provide real-world industrial experiences, emphasizing core competencies per IT2017 guidelines

learning_goals: Explain the basic components of IoT systems (sensors, communication, data processing) and analyze real-world cases
Implement IoT device networking and data collection processes in a simulated environment
Design and present solutions to IoT-based social problems through VR-based scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
